title: Model-Based Technology-Enhanced Mathematics Learning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Proficiency in Using Fundamental Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Designing customized math learning systems by applying model-based teaching methods in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can visually structure mathematics education scenarios using model-based design tools
Learners can select the optimal combination of LMS tools depending on the situation
Learners can design and implement effective mathematics learning activities in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
